attributes.comment:
What is guarantee that by paying higher fees will improve services ?

where will you bring Visa's for EB and Family based cases ? there is huge
RETROGESSION in Employement Based and Family Based Immigration. People
from 1999/2000 are still waiting for Green card. few thousands are stuck in FBI
name check process for minimum 5 years. Few thousand are stuck in same even
after they have passed interview . ur dept stopped WOM cases. so they are
helpless.

by paying more money will ur dept and FBI be accountable ? where is 2006 report
of visa's issuesed ?

if there are answers to above then by all means go ahead and ask for more money
from poor LEGAL immigrants !
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Raj
